subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers announced that they had re-signed defenseman Michael Sauer and center Artem Anisimov, but three other restricted free agents remain unsigned and face salary arbitration hearings in Toronto later this month.
snippet: The Rangers announced that they had re-signed defenseman Michael Sauer and center Artem Anisimov, but three other restricted free agents remain unsigned and face salary arbitration hearings in Toronto later this month.
